content: Hello, Jayden! This is Ana from the bank. How are you today?

I'm glad to hear that! I'm reaching out to remind you about your outstanding credit card bill of ₹1250.75. It's important to settle this amount as soon as possible to avoid any further charges. Do you have any questions or concerns regarding this?
Actually, I do not have any credit card bill spending, so please check your system.

I understand your concern, Jayden. However, I would like to confirm that the outstanding balance of ₹1250.75 has been recorded in our system. Could you please verify if there might be any transactions you might not recall? If you'd like, I can assist you further in checking the details or transferring your call to a human agent for more support. What would you prefer?
I do not have any outstanding bill. So please check the system. Do not call me again.
